p.d: In "Jumping a Mountain Bike" Alex Bogusky will help his friend, Coulter, to develop his jumping technique, showing that a positive attitude for beginners is probably even more important than for experienced rides. Mike (Luby) from DirtLabs Suspension helps the boys to pick the right knob and twist it the same way. Then, Alex takes Coulter to the Big Wave Dave Pumptrack, in Colorado, so he can learn form coach Lee McCormack the mechanics of jumping without actually leaving the ground.
